Desc.entry: Hosts Handsworth Community Forum which holds regular meetings to discuss issues of concern to the community. Provides support to a playgroup, pram club, parent and toddlers and guides group, senior citizens luncheon club, and a meeting place for various other community-based groups for adults and young people. Facilities include photocopying, meeting rooms and a large, well-equipped hall for hire (see separate entry). Holds summer fayre in June/July and Christmas market in November.

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 13
